naslov: ŽUPA! SNIŽENO! VILLA S BAZENOM 250m2, garaža, parking (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se lijepa samostojna kuća sa bazenom, okućnicom, terasama, vrtom i parkingom. Podijeljena je u dvije jedinice: Stan u prizemlju od cca 64m2 te veliki dvoetažni stan na katu i potkrovlju. Kuća je potpuno uređena i opremljena. Stan u prizemlju je jednosobni i pored njega je garaža. Na katu i potkrovlju su 4 spavaće sobe, 3 kupaonice, kuhinja, dnevni boravak te trpezarija sa lođom i terasom te bazenom. - samostojeći objekat - kvalitetna gradnja - kvalitetno unutrašnje uređenje - dobra pozicija - velike terase, bazen, parking - garaža - uhodan posao najma turistima Sve dodatne informacije u Agenciji DMP. ----------- A beautiful detached house for sale with a swimming pool, garden, terraces, garden and parking. It is divided into two units: an apartment on the ground floor of approx. 64m2 and a large two-story apartment on the first floor and attic. The house is fully finished and equipped. The apartment on the ground floor is a one-room apartment with a garage next to it. On the first floor and the attic there are 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a kitchen, a living room and a dining room with a loggia and a terrace and a swimming pool. - a detached building - quality construction - quality interior design - good position - large terraces, swimming pool, parking - garage - well-established business of renting to tourists All additional information in the DMP Agency.
